mapper.select: select distinct * from `pet-adoption`.account a join `pet-adoption`.collect_acc_pet cap on a.account_id = cap.acc_id join `pet-adoption`.pet p on cap.pet_id = p.pet_id join `pet-adoption`.bulletin b on p.bulletin_id = b.bulletin_id join `pet-adoption`.picture pic on pic.pic_id = p.picture_id where cap.acc_id = #{accId} and b.is_delete = 0 and p.is_delete = 0 and a.account_status = 1 and a.is_delete = 0 order by b.gmt_modified
